subject: Re: Before/After cannot be resolved to a type
msgSnippet: i fixed this by changing the import from: import org.junit.Test; to import org.junit.*; not sure if there s a better way...
messageBody:
i fixed this by changing the import from:

import org.junit.Test;

to

import org.junit.*;


not sure if there's a better way...




--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "joelemm" <eugene@...> wrote:
>
> i'm trying to use the @Before, @After annotations and i get a "... cannot be resolved to a type" error.
>
> i am importing as follows:
>
> import org.junit.Test;
> import static org.junit.Assert.*;
>
> ....
>
> @Before
> public void setup() {
> ...
> }
>
>
> methods annotated with @Test work fine.
> i am doing this from eclipse using JUnit4.
>
> any tips much appreciated.
>
